analysis.description:
BCDCVault.unlockForFounders (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#512-533) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! bcdcMultisig.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#530-532)

BCDCToken.finalizeCrowdfunding (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#828-875) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! bcdcMultisig.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#874-875)

Reentrancy in BCDCToken.setUpgradeAgent (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#925-941):
	External calls:
	- ! upgradeAgent.isUpgradeAgent() (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#933)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- upgradeAgentStatus (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#939)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#68-73) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
MultiSigWallet.executeTransaction.tx (local variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#319-322) shadows built-in symbol "tx"

BCDCToken.allowance.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#698) shadows:
	- BCDCToken.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#542-543)

Reentrancy in BCDCToken.BCDCToken (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#611-659):
	External calls:
	- ! timeVault.isBCDCVault() (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#650-651)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bcdcMultisig (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#651-652)
	- owner (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#654-657)

BCDCToken.finalizedUpgrade should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#599-600)
UpgradeAgent.isUpgradeAgent should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#447-448)
UpgradeAgent.owner should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0xb4c55b5a1faf5323e59842171c2492773a3783dd.sol#447)
